meanings.definition: Resembling a jute plant in appearance or characteristics.
meanings.sent1: The jutelike leaves of the plant swayed gently in the breeze.
meanings.sent2: The bag had a rough, jutelike texture.
meanings.sent3: The jutelike vines in the garden seemed to dance in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: Her hair, jutelike and tangled, framed her face beautifully.
meanings.sent5: The jutelike fibers of the rope were strong and durable.

meanings.definition: In a manner similar to jute.
meanings.sent1: She moved jutelike through the crowd, blending in effortlessly.
meanings.sent2: The fabric draped jutelike over the chair, creating a rustic look.
meanings.sent3: He spoke jutelike, using simple words that everyone could understand.
meanings.sent4: The river flowed jutelike, meandering gently through the valley.
meanings.sent5: The wind whispered jutelike through the trees, rustling the leaves.

meanings.definition: Having qualities or characteristics of jute.
meanings.sent1: The jutelike bag was sturdy and eco-friendly.
meanings.sent2: Her dress had a natural, jutelike color that complemented her skin tone.
meanings.sent3: The jutelike scent of the flowers filled the room with a pleasant aroma.
meanings.sent4: The jutelike texture of the carpet felt rough underfoot.
meanings.sent5: The jutelike threads of the fabric added a unique touch to the design.
